questions.question: Which of the following is NOT something we have learned about Biddy?

choices.answer: She always wears a long coat with snacks pinned to the inside

questions.question: Which of the following is NOT true about Quincy?

choices.answer: She doesn’t like Biddy, and calls her names like “fat cow”
She is more academically capable than Biddy.

questions.question: Where will the girls be living after they graduate high school?

choices.answer: In the apartment above Miss Lizzy’s garage
They will be going to the same college and live in the dorms

questions.question: Why does Biddy love her new room/apartment so much?

choices.answer: She’s never had any space of her own before that was tidy and clean
Miss Lizzy is rich and she knows they will be living in style now
She’s super excited to be living with Quincy
It's far away from Granny and nobody will be able to hurt her no3

questions.question: What seems to be Quincy’s biggest issue with Biddy?
Which girl will work at the nearby grocery story?
Which girl will be a sort of housekeeper for Miss Lizzy?
What is Ms. Delamino’s advice for Quincy before she leaves the girls for the night?

choices.answer: To get a tv so they have something to do at night
To share her alarm clock with Biddy
To try and not spend all her money
To try to be nice to Biddy
